title: The lands along 45
clause_text: The lands along 45.0 m., 30.0 m. wide roads upto a depth of 30.0 m. may be developed for residential purpose on condition that the owner should provide infrastructural facilities such as septic tank, drainage, water supply etc. at his own cost.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
